1.content:
You are Aaron. A young man with a small stature. You may be tiny but your dreams are big as you want to conquer the working world and be a huge success! This isn't easy though since all men are tiny but women are normal sized.

It happened years ago when a virus hit humanity hard! Well the males anyways.. they all shrank down to a few inches tall. Women on the other hand stayed the same height, but the virus actually enhanced them keeping them from aging past their prime and making it nearly impossible to not stay in good shape. Luckily men also stayed in good shape, aside from being shrunken and they also have very durable bodies that can survive being crushed and stretched and flattened....they are gonna need all the help they can get. A cure was never found... Men were too small to do much about it and women loved the new changes and never bothered with it.

Now back to you! This is the only world you've known and you've read plenty of the great accomplishments men made in the past and despite your size you are determined to be successful and respected!! You have a nice chunk of savings built up and are doing pretty damn good considering the circumstances but it is hard getting respect from women as guys are just so small now. You don't let that deter you though!

You get out of bed and do your morning stretches. You live in a large building with stores at the ground level and apartments up top. You have a nice apartment designed for tinies and it's a cozy place and very close to work! Speaking of which you better hurry or you're gonna be late!

11.content:
Your apartment is situated just above your workplace which is super convenient and you are never late!! You even have a private elevator that takes you straight down to the front desk.

Due to your degree in business and excellent customer service skills you managed to snag a job as the manager of a beauty salon! Either that or you are a glorified mascot.... Most days you feel like a little mascot... Your employees are incredible at their jobs but definitely don't treat you like the boss.

The hairdresser, Chenelle is a strong willed, curvy woman with dark tanned skin like a cappuccino. She has tons of pooffy, curly hair that is jet black, light brown eyes and thick lips full of sass. She has a huge ass and tons of attitude and she is always late!! This drives you up the wall! You also can't help but feel that she wants to be the one in charge.

The twins, Debbie and Diana, they usually call themselves the double Dee's, are also remarkable hairdressers but specialize in dying hair. They usually change their own colors once a month. They are peppy and carefree, though very mischievous and love to mess with you. They are beautiful young women and while just a little shorter than Chenelle, they also pack all the right curves in all the right places.

The new girl, Tina is a gorgeous Latina with long dark hair and a smooth light tan complexion and works at the counter greeting customers but also specializes in massages. She is very friendly and sweet, somewhat timid and seems to think highly of you along with the rest of her co-workers. She takes her job seriously and is also always on time. You like her a lot and definitely want to keep the good impression you seem to have with her.

Customers are like your biggest fans for the most part, flirty and always commenting on how cute you are though you don't feel like they take you very seriously either. It is nice having all these beautiful women around though.

As your little elevator arrives at the front desk you take a deep breath and hype yourself up for the day. You step out confidently, a few minutes early and hop onto the keyboard to wake up the computer. It's like a morning workout as you hop around on the keys typing the password and loading up today's appointments. Sure you could have had a tiny PC set up but you enjoy these little exercise routines to start the day.

Tina arrives at the front door and unlocks it letting her in, she's right on time as always, and gives you a cheerful smile.

"Good morning sir!" She announces bubbly.

You smile back "good morning Tina! Right on time as usual."

She giggles "of course! I always try to be. Gonna start putting the towels in the steamer" she walks off happily to start her job.

Not a bad start so far!

"Oh and Tina, sweety, do make sure Mr. Manager is ready for my hair appointment. I want him to be there and supervise in case I need anything. Though I'm sure Chenelle will do a perfect job as always."

"Of course Doct... I mean of course BB?" Tina says excited to be in this alpha woman's favor but unsure of how informal she should be.

"Much better" Barbie says with approval happy to hear her nickname.

By now your body is starting to pop back into three dimensional shape, though flinching and twitching in pain as you reform. Barbie is now fully dressed and unfortunately heading right for you to exit the room! Her left high heel once again annihilates your crotch under Barbies full weight, forcing a squeak of pain out of you. Barbie is surprised, unaware you were in her way but pretends not to notice your squeak as she cracks a smile and keeps walking leaving you behind.

"Oh there you are!" Says Tina as she finally shifts her gaze from Dr. Barbie to the source of the squeak. She gently picks you up from the floor and brings you to the massage table. "Oh you poor little guy" she says as she starts firmly massaging you helping your body recover and pop into place. It hurts and feels amazing at the same time. She really does have a magic touch for this, you think to yourself as you start to feel much better.

"Thank you Tina this feels amazing, and thank you so much for saving me back there!"

"Of course! I was so worried though she can be quite intimidating."

"Heh... Tell me about it.."

Tina smiles but then gets a worried look "I'm sure you heard she wants you to be at her appointment?"

You put on a brave face "yeah but don't worry I'll be fine! I'm sure the worst is over." You of course aren't so sure but Tina beams happily at your reassurance.

"You're right I know you can do it Mr. Manager!" She gives you a wink and blows you a kiss lifting your spirits slightly.

She then picks you back up and heads out the door towards Chenelles station.

"Hi Chenelle! BB wants our little Manager to supervise the appointment. She did quite a number on him in there please try to help him out a bit!"

While you appreciate the gesture you know this was too much info to give Chenelle and gulp nervously as Tina places hands you over.

"Oh sweet, sweet Tina always looking out for everyone!" She hugs her with one arm and gives her a big wet kiss on the cheek. "Don't you worry about a thing sugar I'll look out for our wonderful manager! Now head on back we've got a busy day!" She says giving Tina a gentle tap on her ass as she happily leaves back to the front desk. She closes her hand gripping you gently but firmly. "Dr. BB! I'm ready for you honey!" She hollars out but her eyes are locked on you, a sly smirk at her lips, striking fear into your very depths.

Once again the gorgeous Dr. Barbie comes into your view and opens wide for a hug. Chenelle simply drops you down onto her own cleavage wedging you tightly from the waist down staring as Barbies tits approach you! The two women embrace, tightly, their tits squishing together causing your lower half you get crushed like a bottle of toothpaste between Chenelles tits.

"Good to see you again BB it's been too long!!"

"Oh Chen I was just over last week" she smirks and gives her friend a slap on the ass.

The two women laugh and hug again before Chen finally plucks you from her cleavage. "Honey we are gonna make sure you have an extra PERFECT experience today! Mistah Manager here is gonna inspect the seat and make sure everything is up to your standards!" Barbie laughs and says "I'm sure you'll do a great job... Again!"

The two beauties laugh as Chen tosses you on the leather salon chair, and while it is a decent cushion it is still a rather rough landing. You sigh under your breath as you stand up and start inspecting the chair as the women chat it up. You knew it was a waste of time as Chenelle is remarkably meticulous with her station and her chair always looks clean and brand new.

You do a full inspection to humor them before yelling out "alright looks like it's all good to go!!" But you get no response. You turn around and look up "I said-" you are horrified as Barbie has positioned herself to sit aiming her big round ass over you, both women peek down and in unison say "we heard you!"

You have no time to react as Barbie PLOPS her thick ass down on the seat plastering you flat underneath her left ass cheek.

Your ears pop with and Earth shattering boom when her ass hits you like a meteor, your body painfully flattened once again under this Sadistic beauty. She learns her weight on you and starts grinding her ass down on the leather which squeaks in protest weakly under her heavy ass. This simple motion for her is pure agony for you as her ass cheek smears you back and forth along the chair, bulldozing you under each ass cheek, spreading you wider and thinner across the unforgiving leather. You are now a skid mark plastered along the surface of the chair, half under one ass cheek, half under the other and your face lined up with her ass crack.

"It's perfect!" Says Barbie happily. "Nah not yet" Says Chenelle as she steps her foot on the switch to make the chair go higher. She could very well make it a slow smooth motion but of course she makes a quick jerking motion making Barbie bounce heavily up and down with each press of the switch hammering you beneath her solid meaty ass, both women laughing and having the time of their lives.

"Oops too high!" Says Chenelle as she lets the chair drop down quickly, Barbie's ass lifts just a tiny bit off of you before SLAMMING down as she catches up to the seat. Chenelle starts the brutal process over again bouncing the blonde beauty on you again and again, a loud WUMP WUMP WUMP with ever impact of her ass on the thin cushion.

You spend the entirety of the hour and half long appointment smothered beneath Dr. Barbies ass cheeks. She is not a calm sitter either, constantly shifting her ass to grind and smear you further into Oblivion and Chenelle constantly readjusting the chair, sometimes to legit get a better able and sometimes just to fuck with you and hammer you under her friend. They chat and laugh and have an amazing time never bothering to acknowledge you.Eventually Chen finishes her work and Barbie is absolutely delighted with the perfect haircut.
1111111111111.title: ASSisting the Supervisor

choices: Chenelle comes back before you escape
you manage to get off the chair
the twins take you
Tina saves you
another customer sits on you
11111111111111.content:
"PERFECT job as always Chen!" Says Barbie as she checks herself out in the mirror, still firmly seated on you, shifting her ass as she looks at herself in different angles.

You've been crushed and smeared and ground flat for what feels like forever under her hot over bearing ass, her unrelenting weight practically making you one with the leather chair. Then finally, the mighty beauty stands up leaving you ironed onto the seat, the cool air finally soothing your aching body that is burning from her body heat. Not to mention the immense relief of having tons of weight lifted off of you.

"Wow what a fantastic job you all did!" Says Barbie out loud. She looks down at you admiring how easily she absolutely she demolished you into a tiny sticker and stretched you across most of the seat. "Even you made up for your little mess up! No more hard feelings then!" She says giving you a wink.

You just lay there too flattened to move, your eye just twitches slightly.

"As a thank you I ordered lunch for everyone while I was getting my hair done, it should get here right about.... Now!"

And with that a cute delivery woman from Chipotle walks in with bags of food! Barbie gives her a nice tip along with a hefty wad of cash to both Tina and Chenelle as tips for her free service.

"I've gotta get going but see you all soon!" And just like that she happily heads out. Your eyes still twitch with each clack of her high heels!

By now the other customers have been taken care of and are heading out too leaving the excited employees to sort through their food!

Chenelle grabs her beefy burrito bean bowl and saunters back over to you happily. "Oh that BB is such a trip! She even sent you a nice fat tip through her app."

You are relieved to be in Barbies good graces again at least and your employees have all been rewarded for their efforts despite your initial mess up. You manage to let out a tiny sigh of relief and manage to say "thank you for taking care of her... Can I get a little help please?"

"Oh sugar you know it is my pleasure to take care of BB! Now I'd love to help you out Sir but my hands are full and I am on break. You know I need my time to decompress!!! You should too, you work so damn hard all the time. I'll even share my seat with you sugar." She says as if doing you a favor.

With that she turns around and presents her massive ass to you, jiggling slightly from her movements. Her ass is slightly larger than Barbies big booty though a little less firm. Your eyes widen in horror and you beg "wait Chanelle just give me a minute!"

"SIR my break has already started!" She says snappily before plopping her phat ass down in you with a hefty THWOMP! Once again your head was lined up with a big butt crack with each half of your body crushed beneath massive heavy ass cheeks.

"Oh yeah that's comfy" she says grinding her ass into the chair, continuing where Barbie left off in smearing you across the chair. Your hopes we're once again burried and ground to dust under your employees mighty ass. Your poor body bearing the weight of a giantess yet again, ruthlessly twisted and spread thinner, if that was even possible, as Chenelle got comfy and started eating her food.

"Mmmmmm she got it spicy too just how I love it!" She says happily bouncing in her seat and mashing you further into a skid mark. "This is gonna do some damage though." She says as she takes a mouthful, the spice already causing her to sweat a little. "That is some fire they have going in here"

Under the extreme pressure and heat you are suffering under you feel it somehow get hotter as Chenelle enjoys her lunch. You smell a slight hint of her humid scent as she begins to sweat a little. This is just getting worse and worse for you...

Chenelle feels this and not wanting to get sweat on her dress stands up for a moment and lifts up her already short cut dress exposing her bare ass! She doesn't even have underwear on! Without even a second thought she drops that phat booty right back onto her tiny manager.

At first you were relieved when her monstrous ass lifted off of you, thinking it might be over. Instead you realized your horrible fate unfolding as she exposed her bare ass to you and SLAMMED it back down in you like a freight train! To your horror she sat with enough force that her anus pressed down enough to squish down on your face practically forcing you to make out with her ass before it lifted up, your flat fade stuck against it for a few moments before slowly peeling off leaving you flattened and damp with her sweat, her bare ass cheeks still annihilating the rest of you.

She felt every bit of that little interaction and absolutely loved it! She bounced slightly in her seat carefully aiming for her back door to pound heavily against your face like a jackhammer. Your poor head was beaten to a pulp as she bounced and bounced and bounced, sometimes swallowing your head up her ass and chewing it like fun as she clenched before it slid back out just to get bounced on again.
She then felt a rumble in her stomach and she pressed her ass down hard on you. "Uh oh... Look out below!" She said as she let a fart rip.

You were already miserable, reduced to a smidge and drenched in her booty sweat but you heard the oninus rumble. "No no no no no" you scream in your head. Her anus rams back down in you eating your face and clenching it tightly! It then suddenly releases and a deafining blast of burning rancid air torches you like a flamethrower, blasting your head back into the leather with a loud slap from the force of her blast.

"Wow... Excuse me! That was so nasty" she says fanning the smell away from her face. "So sorry!" She says casually before taking another bite, pressing her anus back down to eat your face and nuking you again!! "Oh wow! That was a good one!" She giggles, the twins burst out laughing, Tina is blissfully unaware and enjoying her food by the counter and chatting with a new customer.

"That was so careless of me! My goodness I am so sorry SIR! Let me get you some fresh air!" With that she bounces up and down brutally pounding your already mashed body even harder and making sure to grind her back door against your face. While horribly painful and merciless, she did indeed help waft away the dank air from her ass a little bit.

By now she is almost done eating and has enjoyed every second of her wonderful break though the rumbles return! She perks up straight drops her booty hole down and bites her lower lip excitedly as she feels your face squish and a vibration of you screaming as she blasts one! Two! Three! Tiny shattering nukes on your poor body in quick succession.

She is tearing up with laughter and fanning away the smell though firmly keeping her piping hot anus pressed on your face. "Alright I think I need to go to the bathroom at this point" she chuckles and finally stands up leaving you annihilated in the chair. "Thanks for the support stinky!" She says with a wink before heading off to the bathroom.

You are completely splattered across the chair, flatter than paper and soaked in booty sweat and thoroughly gassed... Completely humiliated and annulated.... Definitely your toughest day yet.... You need to get the fuck off of this chair!!!
11111111111111.title: Lunch Break Beating

info.brief_description: Take the roll of a tiny guy as he tries to make it big in the work place.
info.description:
You are Aaron. A young man with a small stature. You may be tiny but your dreams are big as you want to conquer the working world and be a huge success! This isn't easy though since all men are tiny but women are normal sized. Luckily or unluckily, tinies have very durable bodies capable of being squished and stretched and tortured, fully healing eventually.

Rules: No scat!
